Description: Spatial units of monitoring of mowing state of grassland plots

SpaceTimeCoverage.BBox: Optional: meaningful specification of spatial bounding box in lat/lon

Remarks: The state of the grassland plots was visually monitored every 2-4 days (for data, see grassland_monitoring.txt). The file grassland_monitoring_units.shp holds the location of the respective units. It is originally based on ownership information, but was refined according to the actual state of management units.
